sdk-staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.'
sdk-staging.post-deploy: npm install ; npm update ; grunt compile --sites=recycle-me --env production ; pm2 restart 'server' -- recycle-me --env production

staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'NPM linking recycle-me and restarting app.';
staging.post-deploy: npm i ; cd /srv/framework/source/ ; grunt compile --sites=recycle-me --env production ; NODE_ENV=production pm2 restart server.js -- recycle-me --env production
